channel.title: Python on Try Harder
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Try Harder

item.title: Jsonpickle Deserialization: Understanding Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities
item.description:
The Dangers of Serialization: Understanding Arbitrary Code Execution Vulnerabilities

Introduction

In modern web development, data serialization and deserialization are common practices. However, these processes can introduce serious security vulnerabilities if not handled properly. In this article, we’ll explore the risks associated with serialization using Python’s jsonpickle library as an example.

item.title: A Comprehensive Guide to Decision Trees: Theory, Applications, and Best Practices
item.description: Decision trees are a versatile, interpretable machine learning algorithm that mirrors human decision-making through hierarchical conditional splits. Widely used for classification and regression tasks, they excel in scenarios requiring transparency and explainability. This article delves into the mathematical foundations, implementation strategies, and advanced considerations for practitioners.

item.title: A Small Python Function to Convert 't'/'f' Strings to Boolean Type
item.description:
Overview

In data analysis and machine learning, it is common to encounter datasets where boolean values are represented as strings like 't' (true) or 'f' (false). Converting these to Python’s True and False types makes subsequent processing and analysis much smoother. This article explains a simple function for this conversion and how to use it effectively.

item.title: Errors in Python
item.description:
1. Invalid comparison between dtype=datetime64[ns, America/New_York] and datetime64

Error

This error occurs when comparing timestamps in Yahoo Finance with different timezones.

item.title: How to Install Freqtrade: Step-by-Step Guide
item.description:
ğŸ“¦ Prerequisite: Python Virtual Environment

sudo apt-get install python3-venv  # Install Python virtual environment

ğŸ› ï¸ Installation Process

  1. Clone the Repository ğŸ“¥
git clone https://github.com/freqtrade/freqtrade.git
  1. Enter Directory & Switch Branch ğŸ“‚
cd freqtrade
git checkout develop  # Switch to develop branch
  1. Run Installation Script âš™ï¸
./setup.sh --install

â³ Important Notes

  • The TA-Lib installation might take 20+ minutes on low-spec systems (tested on Azure 1CPU/1GB RAM) â˜ï¸â±ï¸
  • Don’t interrupt the process - just let it run! â˜•ï¸

âœ… Completion

You’ll see success messages when fully installed! ğŸ‰
Check with freqtrade --version to verify installation âœ”ï¸
